pages.text: $(thing)物流框架/$是可以被附著於容器或儲罐上以標記為$(thing)物流系統/$之一部分的部件。$(p)放置下的物流框架可以透過使用$(l:tools/logistics_configurator)物流設定器/$$(thing)右擊/$設定，使用其$(thing)潛行右擊/$移除。物品形式的物流框架可以通過手持該物品右擊進行設定。

The following frame properties can be configured:$(li)All Frames support $(thing)filtering/$ to control what items/fluids they will provide or accept. See also $(l:tools/tag_filter)Tag Filters/$.$(li)The $(thing)Filter/$ side tab lets you configure whether filters match by $(thing)item NBT/$ or $(thing)mod ID/$, and also whether the filter should be applied as a whitelist (default) or blacklist.

$(li)For $(l:logistics/frames#requester)Requester Frames/$, the $(thing)Minimum Order Size/$ tab allows you to configure the minimum amount of items or fluid that will be moved at a time; useful to prevent drones making constant trips with tiny payloads.$(li)Finally, all frames can be configured to be $(thing)invisible/$ to players unless they are holding a Logistics item (frame or configurator). Note: invisible frames pass any player left-clicks on to the block beneath.

pages.title: 物流主動供應框架
pages.text: $(item)物流主動供應框架/$向$(l:logistics/frames#requester)物流請求框架/$、$(l:logistics/frames#storage)物流儲存框架/$和$(l:logistics/frames#default_storage)物流預設儲存框架/$提供物品/流體。

pages.title: 物流被動供應框架
pages.text: $(item)物流被動供應框架/$僅向$(l:logistics/frames#requester)物流請求框架/$提供物品/流體。

pages.title: 物流儲存框架
pages.text: $(item)物流儲存框架/$可以從$(l:logistics/frames#active_provider)物流主動供應框架/$接受物品/流體，向$(l:logistics/frames#requester)物流請求框架/$提供物品。

pages.title: 物流預設儲存框架
pages.text: $(item)物流預設儲存框架/$可以從$(l:logistics/frames#active_provider)物流主動供應框架/$接受物品/流體，向$(l:logistics/frames#requester)物流請求框架/$和$(l:logistics/frames#storage)物流儲存框架/$提供物品/流體。該框架的優先度比物流儲存框架更低，所以物品/流體會優先嘗試進入物流儲存框架。

pages.title: 物流請求框架
pages.text: $(item)物流請求框架/$可以從其他加框架的容器請求物品。對於該框架，使用設定介面指定框架試圖在容器中$(thing)維持/$的各個物品/流體的量。
